Key Match Events: Virat Kohli compiled a superb half-century to rescue India after an early Australia attack
Jasprit Bumrah stood out once again as India excelled with the ball on a good batting wicket
Mohammed Shami's five-wicket haul helped India register a comfortable win with two overs to spare
Shami, the man who had replaced Hardik Pandya in the India lineup, stood up and delivered with a scintillating five-for
Mohammed Siraj and Shami sliced through the Sri Lanka batting order like a hot knife through butter
Mohammed Shami finished with 7/57 in Mumbai
Miscellaneous Highlights: India will take on Australia in the 2023 ICC Men's Cricket World Cup Final
A host nation will feature in the event’s final for the fourth time in a row, starting with India themselves in 2011
Led by Rohit Sharma’s belligerence and Virat Kohli’s assurance, the batting unit has clicked in all their games so far
Mohammed Shami’s excellence has led their bowling effort, which has seen both the pacers and spinners thrive
Others: India's first non-Asian opponent in three games also proved to be their most challenging competitor thus far
India accumulated their ninth win in as many league stage matches with a victory against Netherlands in Bengaluru
India broke their Kiwi hoodoo in the ICC tournament knockout games and went on to secure a place in the finals
India's top and middle order dominated the proceedings in the batting innings
India won by a record margin of 302 runs after bowling their opponents out for 55

India's batting struggled on a tough wicket in the match against England
